about_the_game:
Monster Crown uses 8-bit influenced melodies to match its pixel-art style and offers fun, upbeat and lighthearted chiptunes that will take you to the colorful world of Crown Island.

Enjoy 47 songs on the Original Soundtrack and listen to 85 minutes of music produced exclusively for the game by talented composers Onion_MU, Alex Naveira and Salahdin.
